mapper.update: update leave_pass set admin_approval = 1, mod_date = now() where no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leave_pass l LEFT OUTER JOIN parents p ON l.student_no = p.student_no JOIN schoolInfo s ON l.school_no = s.school_code WHERE l.school_no = #{schoolNo} ORDER BY end_date DESC

SELECT l.*, p.phone as parent_phone, s.school_name FROM leave_pass l LEFT OUTER JOIN parents p ON l.student_no = p.student_no JOIN schoolInfo s ON l.school_no = s.school_code WHERE l.school_no = #{keyWord} ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT ${criteria.skip}, ${criteria.amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE leave_pass SET comeback_date = now(), mod_date = now() WHERE NO = #{no} AND end_date = now()
mapper.select: SELECT l.*, p.phone as parent_phone, s.school_name FROM leave_pass l JOIN parents p ON l.student_no = p.student_no JOIN schoolInfo s ON l.school_no = s.school_code WHERE l.school_no = #{schoolNo} AND l.comeback_date = '1000-01-01'
